wanderingMiniBosses:BossBurn.NAME: Burn
wanderingMiniBosses:BossBurn.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, NL draw a card. NL You take !M! more damage. NL Exhaust.

wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultAttackWithVar.NAME: Special Strike
wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultAttackWithVar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !wanderingMiniBosses:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultSecondMagicNu.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
wanderingMiniBosses:DefaultSecondMagicNu.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !wanderingMiniBosses:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
